citation: Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022 fix 23 June 2023 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 June 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 23 June 2023

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
